main.java.indexer.server.daos

Class BatchDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.indexer.server.daos.BatchDAO

  • public class BatchDAO
extends java.lang.Object

    Used to access the Batch table in the database. Has all needed CRUD operations.

      • readBatchesForProject

        public java.util.List<Batch> readBatchesForProject(Project project)
        Reads and returns all batches for a given project from the database.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to be used in the query.
        Returns:
        a list of all batches in the given project.

      • readBatch

        public Batch readBatch(java.lang.String batchId)
        Reads from the database and returns the batch with the given batchId.
        Parameters:
        batchId - the batchId given to query the database.
        Returns:
        the batch with the given batchId if exists, otherwise null.

      • deleteBatchesForProject

        public void deleteBatchesForProject(Project project)
        Deletes all batches for the given project.
        Parameters:
